preference.name: WRKFLW_fnd0Instructions_available
preference.preference_description: Preference to enable/disable "fnd0Instructions" property in stylesheet. Valid Values: * true: Enables the "fnd0Instructions" property and disables property "object_desc"in stylesheets.This is the default value. * false: Disables the "fnd0Instructions" property and enables property "object_desc".
